# RishteBio - Professional Bio-Data Builder

A premium, privacy-focused bio-data builder for matrimonial and professional purposes enhanced with AI assistance (Google Gemini).

## Purpose
RishteBio allows users to create, customize, and download high-quality marriage bio-data and professional profiles. It focuses on a clean user experience, beautiful typography, and AI-driven content generation.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: React 19 (TypeScript)
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **AI Integration**: Google Gemini (@google/genai)
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Styling**: Modern CSS / Tailwind CSS
- **Routing**: React Router DOM v7
- **Date Handling**: date-fns, react-day-picker

## Core Components
- **Editor**: Multi-step form for Personal, Family, Education, and Work details.
- **Templates**: A collection of premium, visually stunning bio-data designs.
- **AI Studio**: Assistant for generating professional descriptions.
- **Live Preview**: Real-time rendering of bio-data as users type.

## Project Structure
- `/src/pages`: Home, Editor, About, Contact, Policies.
- `/src/components`: UI elements (NavBar, Footer, Templates, Editor components).
- `/src/services`: Integration logic for external APIs.
- `/src/types.ts`: Type definitions for bio-data and app state.
- `/src/translations.ts`: Support for multiple languages/text content.
